pkp:terms_of_use.pkp:plugins.generic.pln.terms_of_use.jm_: I have the authority to include this journal's content in a secure preservation network and, if and when necessary, to make the content accessible in the PKP-PLN and its successors.
pkp:terms_of_use.pkp:plugins.generic.pln.terms_of_use.pkp: I agree to allow the PKP-PLN to include this journal's title and ISSN, and the email address of the Primary Contact, with the preserved journal content.
